name: Don't Watch Obunga At 3AM
description:
Submission to Shitty Horror Game Jam 2022

Don't Watch Obunga At 3AM is a 3D Short Horror game where Obunga coming at your house while you watch a youtube clickbait video. He want you to open the door. Should you open it for him?

Features:

  • Multiple ending

Controls:

  • Mouse to Look
  • WASD to Move

Credits:

Models

  • Phone by Vertex Studio (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/free-smartphone-90324)
  • House by Johnny Kasapi (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/furnished-cabin-7142...)

Sounds

  • Ambient by Amszala (https://freesound.org/people/amszala/sounds/84953/)
  • Door Knock by Oldhiccup (https://freesound.org/people/oldhiccup/sounds/567607/)
